metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16231 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
drivers/net/fjes/fjes_main.c in the Linux kernel 5.2.14 does not check thealloc_workqueue return value, leading to a NULL pointer dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16231` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-74.84
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-74.84
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-74.84
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-74.84
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-74.84
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.3.0-26-generic - 5.3.0-26.28~18.04.1
